comments.body: how we going in long run keep this list consistent with pkg/cloudprovider/providers/providers.go ?

See: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/37037

No cloudproviders will be added anymore, that makes it easy to do this :)
In the very long run, cloudproviders will eventually be installable via `kubectl apply -f`
Isn't there already a function for this in pkg/cloudproviders?

See [the motivation above](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/37835#issue-192929635)

Removing the cloudprovider dependency saves ut _a lot_ in Godep size and >40MB in binary size.
I noticed it when preparing https://github.com/kubernetes/kubeadm/pull/72
And since no new cloudproviders will be added or removed, it's totally fine to have a static list here. Compile times are also much lower now.
